thread.title: Stocks open lower on drop in oil, copper prices
thread.title_full: Stocks open lower on drop in oil, copper prices

title: Stocks open lower on drop in oil, copper prices
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Sep 22, 2015, 14:56 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 34 mins Stocks open lower on drop in oil, copper prices Reuters – 19 minutes ago View Photo 
Traders work on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange in New York August 26, 2015. REUTERS/Lucas … (Reuters) - Stocks opened lower on Tuesday, weighed down by a fall in copper and oil prices due to concerns about the outlook for the Chinese economy. 
The Dow Jones industrial average (.DJI) fell 119.52 points, or 0.72 percent, to 16,390.67, the S&P 500 (.SPX) lost 16.06 points, or 0.82 percent, to 1,950.91 and the Nasdaq composite (.IXIC) dropped 64.20 points, or 1.33 percent, to 4,764.75. 
(Reporting by Abinaya Vijayaraghavan in Bengaluru; Editing by Savio D'Souza) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
